entry.name: Tyranids/HiddenHunterFlavor
entry.value: A Lictor's primary purpose is to lead the Tyranid swarm to fresh prey and seek out large groups of foes that might be hiding or fleeing before the swarm.

entry.name: Tyranids/MindEaterFlavor
entry.value: Feeder tendrils drain the victim’s skull, siphoning vital knowledge and memories with every scrap of brain matter.

entry.name: Tyranids/SupriseAmbushDescription
entry.value: Increases the accuracy and armor penatration of overwatch attacks.

entry.name: Tyranids/SupriseAmbushFlavor
entry.value: A master assassin, the Deathleaper can spend days hiding immobile, waiting for a chance to strike once its prey's guard is down.

entry.name: Tyranids/ItsAfterMeDescription
entry.value: Shatters an enemies morale and lowers their accuracy.

entry.name: Tyranids/ItsAfterMeFlavor
entry.value: It's there, I know it is, lurking in the shadows, stalking me like an animal. It's death itself I tell you, just watching me, waiting… Oh blessed Emperor, why won't it just kill me?— The ravings of Cardinal Salem
